name: SPAMTON'S [comeback specil]
description:
This is a short game where you play as the [[BIG SHOT]] himself and get an all-new Pipis-Blaster. [Batteries Not Included] After obtaining the Pipis-Blaster, survive in an arena for a minute before getting to reach [[HEAVEN]] Why are there zombie Spamtons running around? Who knows.

Spamton model: Stylized Spamton + NEO - Deltarune - Buy Royalty Free 3D model by VibaPop (@VibaPop) [35d3df1] (sketchfab.com)

Sounds: Freesound & Deltarune

Music: 

Deltarune: Toby Fox
